Edge Case Annotations.sendToWinner without setting winner or w: Contract might fail or send zero value if winner or winAmount is not set
Edge Case Annotations.Reentrancy Risk: Unchecked low-level calls can lead to reentrancy attacks in both sendToWinner and withdrawLeftOver functions

Common Attack Patterns.Unchecked Low-Level Calls: Potential reentrancy attack vulnerability due to use of send without reentrancy guard
Common Attack Patterns.Access Control: No specific owner or authorized role is set, allowing any caller to call withdrawLeftOver

Recovery Mechanisms: None present - Consider adding emergency stop or fallback functionality
